📱 One day, my grandfather bought a smartphone…
…but he didn’t know how to use Google Maps, WhatsApp, or make online payments.
I was there to guide him — step by step. But it made me think:
👉 What about those who don’t have someone to help them?
Many elderly people struggle with digital tools that are second nature to us.
That’s when the idea struck. 💡
I built Digital Literacy Companion – a Django-based platform designed for senior citizens, to help them navigate the digital world confidently.
🌟 What it offers:
✅ Step-by-step video tutorials on essential apps
✅ Support for multiple Indian languages
✅ Voice command navigation for accessibility
✅ Font resizing for better readability
✅ An AI-powered chatbot (Gemini 1.5 Flash) that answers their questions in simple terms
Whether it's learning to send a WhatsApp message, booking a ride, or understanding digital payments — this companion is designed with empathy and simplicity.
👴👵 This project is close to my heart, and I hope it helps many others like my grandfather embrace technology without fear.
🔗 Check it out: https://lnkd.in/gfn5s7Ji
Let’s build tech that includes everyone. ❤️
